title: gzweb is not deploying. there are node-gyp errors

content.raw:
I am using ubuntu 14.04 with ros indigo and gazebo 2. I was able to deploy gzweb and run 2 weeks ago. I can't deploy it now. I tried all version of nodejs with all gzweb branches(1.0,1.1.0,1.2.0 and 2.0.0). I am facing with the "there are node-gyp errors" text mostly. when I try to run node-gyp rebuild or node-gyp configure it says "can't find binding.gyp". I tried on ubuntu 16 with ros kinetic and gazebo8 using nodejsv8 and gzweb_2.0.0, it is working, but I need to make it run on ubuntu 14. 
I can copy-paste the errors if needed. please help me I am running out of time :)
